divs: Sighting DetailsSITTING IN YARD WITH FRIEND,SMOKING CIGARS.NEIGHBORS WHERE SHOOTING FIREWORKS LEFT OVER FROM THE FOURTH OF JULY.I WAS LOOKING FOR THE DISPLAY,WHEN I SEE THE UFO,FRIEND SEE'S IT ALSO.I LIVE 3 MILES FROM ATLANTIC,AND UFO APPEARED TO BE A SHORT DISTANCE OFF SHORE.AT FIRST I SAID, WHAT THE HELL IS THAT? LIVING ON THE SPACE COAST FOR OVER 30 YEARS,I'VE SEEN A LOT OF ROCKET ACTIVITY.THIS LOOKED LIKE A THREE ENGINED ROCKET RETURNING TO THE CAPE.FLEW HORIZONTAL WITH A SLIGHT DECENT WENT BEHIND TREE LINE,SHAPE LOOKED LIKE 3 FLAMES SOLID ORANGE IN TRIANGULAR POSITION MOVING NORTHWEST,DID NOT FLICKER,SILENT.GLAD I SAW IT.PETE
Summary: LOOKED LIKE 3 FLAME SHAPES,TRIANGULAR,600MPH,3000FT,AGL HEADIND TOWARDS KSC.SILENT.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around July 5th 2013
